name: Lonely Planet (eyes_nt, Nanami, PB, Sadie)
description:
Your spaceship has crash-landed on an esoteric alien planet, surrounded by lush and vibrant forests, leaving you stranded alone with no option but to explore. Wander through the weird and wonderful environment using various landmarks to guide you in order to find your way to that radio-tower in the distance. What intriguing things will you find scattered around? What are these weird machines you keep finding? How will you get home?

And are you really out here all alone?

------------------

Created for Game Design Studio 4 2021 at RMIT by:

Green (https://eyes-nt.itch.io/),
Maddie (https://itch.io/profile/caninepb)
Sadie (https://bookgirl.itch.io/)
Jasmine (https://nanami73.itch.io/)

Check the readme file in the zip folder for asset credits.

Enjoy!
